newsitem.title: FINLAND: HONKARAKENNE TO BUILD NAGANO SUOMI HOUSE.
newsitem.headline: HONKARAKENNE TO BUILD NAGANO SUOMI HOUSE.

text.p: Pre-fabricated loghouse maker Honkarakenne Oy has been selected by the Finnish foreign trade association to build a so called Suomi-house for the 1998 olympic winter games in Japan, the association said on Tuesday.
Honkarakenne will deliver a two-story building with floor space of over 200 square metres to be erected at Hakuba some 50 km from Nagano, which is the main venue of the games, it said in a statement.

The Suomi-house will be used to present Finland and Finnish athletes as well as sponsor companies like telecoms group Nokia and national carrier Finnair , it said. --Helsinki newsroom +358-9-680 50 245, e-mail news@reuters.fi
